name: The Ms-adventures of Janet and Sachi (Kumachan)
name_original: The Ms-adventures of Janet and Sachi (Kumachan)
description:
Virtua-scapes is looking for volunteers to test out it's next gen hardware.  How far will Janet and Sachi go in their race against time while competing against some of the very best?

Full game created in Smile Game Builder RPG Edition.  6 levels of light puzzle solving and a countdown timer on some to intensify the stakes!  Make the choice of saving your earnings or use it to enhance your ability to proceed further!  Fun game for all ages!
